attributes.action: Stopping Fuel Costs Profiteering by Government and Oil companies,Speculators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is it not about time the government remembers that it works for us and should be looking after our interests, not just there own.
Why are oil speculators and Oil companies, still allowed to play with prices,forcing up the pump price which also puts the cost of everthing we buy up [ie hauliers costs have to be passed on]and where is our government watchdog to help the electorate out.
